meanings.sent1: The trampier path was easier to walk on than the rocky one.
meanings.sent2: She wore the trampier shoes for the long hike through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The trampier route through the park led to unexpected discoveries.
meanings.sent4: His trampier attitude towards life made him more resilient.
meanings.sent5: The trampier terrain made the journey more enjoyable.

meanings.sent1: The trampier clothes were more worn out than the others in the thrift store.
meanings.sent2: Her room looked even trampier after the party with clothes strewn everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The trampier appearance of the old house gave it a mysterious charm.
meanings.sent4: The trampier look of the alley made it seem like a forgotten corner of the city.
meanings.sent5: The trampier decorations added a cozy feel to the room.
